title: Expedia Vs Adobe Vs Goldman Sachs || SDE-2
content:
Education: B.Tech in CS from Tier-3
Years of Experience: 3+
Current CTC - 14+1 LPA

Company: Expedia
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Gurgaon, India
Salary: 26LPA
Relocation/Joining: 4.5LPA (excluding tax)
Signing Bonus: INR 2.5L
Stock bonus: 11000$ (4 years)
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 
1st year = 26L + 2.5L + 9L + 4.5L = 42 LPA
 After 1st year = 26 + 2(Stocks) 

Company: Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: Associate 
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 30LPA
Relocation/Joining: 1.6L
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 6L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 30L + 6L = 36LPA


Company: Adobe
Title/Level: MTS-2
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 26LPA
Relocation/Joining: NA
Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 57L
Variable: 10% ~ 2.2L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 26L + 2L + (57/4) + 2.2(variable) = 42.2LPA

Which should I take? And can anyone reading from same companies provide me pros and cons? 
I am confused between GS and Adobe. GS provides appraisal on overall CTC (36LPA). And should I go for more base or more stock values?

title: Avalara | SSE | Nov 2024
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier-3 College
Years of Experience: 3+ years
Prior Experience: SDE at FAANG
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Avalara
Title: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Pune, India (Remote)
Salary/Base: ₹38,00,000
Annual Bonus: ₹3,80,000
Stock Bonus: N/A
Joining Bonus: ₹6,00,000 (1 year clawback)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ₹47,80,000 (1st year) ₹41,80,000 (2nd year onwards)
Previous CTC: ₹30,00,000 (₹23,50,000 Base + ₹6,50,000 Stocks)
Other Details: 1 extra round to increase compensation.


Rejected the offer since interview process had very low bar. If I was sitting in place of interviewer, I would have rejected myself.

title: Microsoft | L62 offer | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.E. in Electronics & Communications from Tier-3 College
Years of experience: 7.5 yrs (non-FAANG)
Date of offer: November 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title: L62 (SDE 2)
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: 43,00,000
Relocation bonus: None
Stock bonus: 100K USD over 4 years
Joining bonus: 7L
Performance bonus : 0-20% (4.3L assuming 10% for 1st year)
Benefits: Standard Microsoft benefits
Counter offers: No

Current TC: 40 LPA

Is this a low-ball offer from Microsoft for someone with ~8 YOE?
Please guide.
